cleaned_text: KING OF PRUSSIA ACUPUNCTURE SPECIALIST Complementary Healthcare provides a tranquil, family like environment that leaves patients very comfortable and satisfied. We are committed to providing reliable healthcare services that complement traditional allopathic care. Eliminate Pain, Nausea And More With ACUPUNCTURE TREATMENTS & TRADITIONAL CHINESE HERBAL MEDICINE Acupuncture has been shown to be a highly effective method for reducing the pain, nausea and other symptoms. It can help to relax the muscles, as well as treat the underlying stress that often accompanies overworked muscles. One of the great benefits of acupuncture is that it can be used on its own or in conjunction with western methods of treatment/management. A complimentary approach is often the best choice for optimizing pain control as well as addressing many other conditions, such as Sciatica, Neuropathy, Spinal Stenosis, Low Back Pain.
